definitions: used to specify the hour in telling time

examples.text: the gates will open at eight o'clock

shortDefinitions: used to specify hour when telling time

definitions: used following a numeral to indicate direction or bearing with reference to an imaginary clock face, 12 o'clock being thought of as directly in front or overhead

examples.text: “I think we've got some action at 11 o'clock,” he said, gesturing toward the eastern plains

shortDefinitions: used following numeral to indicate direction or bearing of imaginary clock face
